form.label: Admin Password Changes
form.description: Password changes of accounts that are listed in the administrative_identities lookup

search.query: `winevent_security` (EventCode=4723 OR EventCode=4724 OR EventCode=627) [inputlookup administrative_identities.csv | fields identity | rename identity as user] | eval subject_domain=mvindex(Account_Domain,0) | eval subject_name=mvindex(Account_Name,0) | eval target_domain=mvindex(Account_Domain,1) | eval target_name=mvindex(Account_Name,1) | table _time EventCode subject Keywords subject_domain subject_name target_domain target_name | rename subject AS Description, Keywords AS Status, subject_domain AS "Subject Domain", subject_name AS "Subject Account", target_domain AS "Target Domain", target_name AS "Target Account"
